alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Clay; Coosa; Randolph; Shelby; Talladega; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 1:09PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Randolph, southwestern Talladega, southeastern Shelby, northern Tallapoosa, northern Chambers, northern Coosa and southern Clay Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 108 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Ashland to near Columbiana. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alexander City, Sylacauga, Columbiana, Wilsonville, Goodwater, Kellyton, Talladega Springs, Stroud, Stewartville, Weogufka, New Site, Wadley, Oak Grove, Five Points, Goldville, Bradford, Strickland Crossroads, Bentleyville, Hatchet and Trammel Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Chambers; Clay; Coosa; Randolph; Shelby; Talladega; Tallapoosa
